name: ProntoDoc for Word Conventional Document
summary: Learn about .PDWR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
Microsoft Word with ProntoDoc for Word plug-in

content: ProntoDoc for Word is used in business environments for generating reports and other business documents.

description: Document used by ProntoDoc for Word (PDW), a Microsoft Word plug-in used for generating documents; saves a document template and includes the populated data fields that have been auto-filled from a source database; used for rendering ProntoDoc for Word templates (.PDW files) into .DOCX, .PDF, and .XPS files.
